name: Burkholderia mallei
notes: formerly Pseudomonas mallei; Classified under SAPO

name: Escherichia coli
notes: hazard group 3* for verocytotoxigenic strains (eg O157:H7 or O103)

name: Francisella tularensis
notes: Type A; Type B hazard group 2

name: Neorickettsia sennetsu
notes: HSE listed name: Ehrlichia sennetsu & Rickettsia sennetsu

name: Salmonella spp
notes: Serovars other than arizonae, enterica serovar enteritidis, enterica serovar typhimurium 2, paratyphi A, B, C, typhi

name: Trueperella pyogenes
notes: HSE listed name: Arcanobacterium pyogenes & Arcanobacterium pyogenes

name: Vibrio cholerae
notes: including El Tor; Toxigenic; Vaccine available
